message.content: Yes, the authors mention that the data and code are available at https://scienceqa.github.io. This allows interested researchers to reproduce the main experimental results and verify their findings.
Yes, the authors have provided the data and code at https://scienceqa.github.io as mentioned in the introduction section of the paper.

Yes, the authors mention that "The data and code are available at https://scienceqa.github.io" in the introduction section of the paper. This indicates that they have provided the necessary materials to reproduce the main experimental results.
